ResourceHeader.ResourceName: VENUS EXPRESS: ASPERA-4 HK3IMA IMA Housekeeping Data Processing Unit (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains calibrated Housekeeping data provided by the processor unit located nearby the IMA sensor.

Parameter.Name: Last command status
Parameter.Description: Last command status. The field takes one of the following values: 0 ok 1 parameter out of range 2 invalid 3 erroneous opcode

Parameter.Name: Current data reduction mode
Parameter.Description: Current data reduction mode. The field takes one of the following mode index values: 0 idle 2 Mspo 4 Msis 5 Mexm 8 Nrm0 9 Nrm1 10 Nrm2 11 Nrm3 12 Nrm4 13 Nrm5 14 Nrm6 15 Nrm7 16 Har0 17 Har1 18 Har2 19 Har3 20 Har4 21 Har5 22 Har6 23 Har7 24 Exm0 25 Exm1 26 Exm2 27 Exm3 28 Exm4 29 Exm5 30 Exm6 31 Exm7 32 Test 33 Cal1 34 Cal2 35 Fake

Parameter.Name: Hw switch status
Parameter.Description: Last command status. This field value has to be decoded in Binary format: bit 0 = Mcp 28V On/Off bit 1 = Opto 28V On/Off bit 2 = Main 28V On/Off bit 3 = Pacc.ref On/Off bit 4 = Grid.ref On/Off bit 5 = Entr.HV.ref On/Off bit 6 = EnyDfl.HV.ref On/Off bit 7 = EnyDfl.LV.ref On/Off 0 = Off 1 = On

Parameter.Name: 28V mcp hv present
Parameter.Description: MCP 28V switch. The field takes one of the following values: 0 No 1 Yes

Parameter.Name: 28V opto hv present
Parameter.Description: Opto 28V switch. The field takes one of the following values: 0 No 1 Yes

Parameter.Name: 28V main hv present
Parameter.Description: Main 28V switch. The field takes one of the following values: 0 No 1 Yes

Parameter.Name: Post acceleration mode
Parameter.Description: Post-acceleration mode. The field takes one of the following values: 0 Fixed 1 Alternating

Parameter.Name: Current sid number
Parameter.Description: IMA internal SID type.

Parameter.Name: New command received toggle bit
Parameter.Description: The new command received toggle 0/1 bit foreach new command returned in Line -First wordcommand return-

Parameter.Name: FIFO filling in terms of internal packets in F8
Parameter.Description: The number of 6 byte packets held in the TM-fifoin F8 representation

Parameter.Name: Opto HV monitor
Parameter.Description: The Opto HV monitor in kilo-volts

Parameter.Name: Mcp HV monitor
Parameter.Description: The Mcp HV monitor in kilo-volts

Parameter.Name: Energy deflection HV monitor
Parameter.Description: The energy deflection HV monitor in kilo-volts

Parameter.Name: Energy deflection LV monitor
Parameter.Description: The energy deflection LV monitor in volts

Parameter.Name: Post-acceleration HV monitor
Parameter.Description: The post-acceleration HV monitor in kilo-volts

Parameter.Name: Grid LV monitor
Parameter.Description: N.A. grid grounded.

Parameter.Name: Sensor unit temperature
Parameter.Description: The sensor unit temperature in degree Celsius

Parameter.Name: DPU temperature
Parameter.Description: The DPU temperature in degree Celsius

Parameter.Name: Energy deflection HV reference
Parameter.Description: The energy deflection HV reference value associated with the monitor reading

Parameter.Name: Post-acceleration low level reference
Parameter.Description: The post-acceleration low level reference

Parameter.Name: Direct command switch
Parameter.Description: The direct command switch.

Parameter.Name: Energy deflection LV reference
Parameter.Description: The energy deflection LV reference value associated with the monitor reading

Parameter.Name: Post-acceleration high level reference
Parameter.Description: The post-acceleration high level reference

Parameter.Name: TM fifo overflow
Parameter.Description: The TM fifo overflow. The field takes one of the following values: 0 No overflow 1 Overflow

Parameter.Name: Entrance HV reference
Parameter.Description: The entrance HV reference value associated with the monitor reading

Parameter.Name: Grid LV reference
Parameter.Description: The grid LV reference value associated with the monitor reading

Parameter.Name: Post-acceleration level
Parameter.Description: The post-acceleration level. The field takes one of the following values: 0 Low 1 High

Parameter.Name: Entrance upper HV monitor
Parameter.Description: The entrance upper HV monitor in kilo-volts

Parameter.Name: MCP default reference
Parameter.Description: The MCP default reference. That is the target value for ramping

Parameter.Name: Opto default reference
Parameter.Description: The Opto default reference. That is the target value for ramping

Parameter.Name: Entrance lower HV monitor
Parameter.Description: The entrance lower HV monitor in kilo-volts

Parameter.Name: MCP current reference
Parameter.Description: The MCP current reference value associated with the monitor reading

Parameter.Name: Opto current reference
Parameter.Description: The Opto current reference value associated with the monitor reading
